content: this quick and easy silt stitch washcloth is my march contribution to the 2024 washcloth cal it is super fun to make and has a great texture > this pattern is available for free on > my blog or purchase the ad-free pdf as > a digital download above materials approximately 84-151 yds of category 4 medium weight cotton yarn i used knit picks dishie yarn in the jalapeno colorway size i 5 5mm furls streamline metal crochet hook yarn needle for weaving ends scissors
